subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. selected Denver, New Orleans, Nashville, Tampa and Indianapolis to host the women’s Final Fours from 2012 through 2016. The cities were selected from among eight finalists announced in August. Denver (2012) and Nashville (2014) will host the event for the first time. New Orleans will host in 2013, Tampa in 2015 and Indianapolis in 2016.
